citations.doc: README_backup.md:11 ('| retryCount | number | Number of retry attempts. Range: **0–10**, default is **1** |')
citations.code: input.ts:18-19 ('if (retryCount < 1 || retryCount > 5) { throw new Error("retryCount must be between 1 and 5"); }')

details.fix_summary: Update README to state the correct range (1–5) and note that out-of-range values throw an error.

citations.code: input.ts:16 ('const retryCount = options?.retryCount ?? 3;') and input.ts:7 (JSDoc: 'Default is 3.')

details.fix_summary: Change documented default to 3 and (optionally) show an example that relies on the default.

details.actual_value: Passing 0 will throw at runtime (allowed values are 1–5)

citations.code: input.ts:18-19 ('if (retryCount < 1 || retryCount > 5) { throw new Error("retryCount must be between 1 and 5"); }')

details.fix_summary: Replace the invalid example with one that either omits the option (to show the default) or uses a valid retryCount (1–5).
